comment: Welcome to San Francisco. This is Folsom Street yesterday (9/30/18). This is the California Senators Feinstein and Harris are working so hard to protect.
amr:
# ::snt Welcome to San Francisco. This is Folsom Street yesterday (9/30/18). This is the California Senators Feinstein and Harris are working so hard to protect.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / welcome-01
            :ARG2 (c / city
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "San"
                        :op2 "Francisco")))
      :snt2 (s / street
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Folsom"
                  :op2 "Street")
            :domain (t / this)
            :time (y / yesterday)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 9
                  :day 30
                  :year18 (w2 / work-01
                        :ARG0 (a / and
                              :op1 (p / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Feinstein")
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (s2 / state
                                                :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "California"))
                                          :ARG2 (s3 / senator)))
                              :op2 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Harris")
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 s2
                                          :ARG2 (s4 / senator))))
                        :ARG1 (p3 / protect-01
                              :ARG0 a
                              :ARG1 a)
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / hard-02
                              :degree (s5 / so))))))

comment: Use of the slur here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults Muslims.
amr:
# ::snt Use of the slur here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults Muslims.
(p / possible-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (a / accept-01
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (s / slur)
                  :location (h / here))
            :prep-in (d / discourse-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / demean-01
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :mod (r / religious-group
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Muslim"))))
                  :op2 (ii / insult-01
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG1 p2))))

comment: Hi there, racist and homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments.
amr:
# ::snt Hi there, racist and homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s2 / slur
                        :mod (r / racism)
                        :mod (h2 / homophobia)))
            :op2 (h3 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s2)
            :op3 (r2 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 s2)))
      :snt3 (r3 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :mod (t2 / type
                        :mod (t3 / this)))))
